lead_paragraph: England winger Chris Ashton will appeal against a 10-week ban for eye-gouging that would rule him out of this year's Six Nations campaign, the BBC reported on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: England's Ashton to Appeal Against Suspension-Report
headline.main: England's Ashton to Appeal Against Suspension-Report

snippet: England winger Chris Ashton will appeal against a 10-week ban for eye-gouging that would rule him out of this year's Six Nations campaign, the BBC reported on Tuesday....
